text: Ara tini ye strilokera ghare chilena se take ku-prarocana dila ebam darajagulo bandha kare dila, ara balala, ‘asa [1].‘Tini balalena, ‘ami allah‌ra asraya prarthana karachi [2], niscaya tini amara maniba; tini amara thakara sundara byabastha karechena. Niscaya yalimara saphalakama haya na [3].’
